class.name: AudioEffectSetCsoundChannel
class.brief_description: Audio effect to set Csound channels.
class.description: Audio effect that allows sending Audio Bus output to Csound numbered channels.

method.name: csound_layout_changed
method.description: Method to notify AudioEffectSetCsoundChannel when Csound layout has changed. This is used internally to update the property list.

method.name: get_csound_name
method.description: Gets the name of the Csound instance that should be used to send the Audio Bus output.

method.name: set_csound_name
method.description: Sets the [param name] of the Csound instance that should be used to send the Audio Bus output.

members.member: The Csound channel number that should be used to recieve the Audio Bus left channel.
The Csound channel number that should be used to recieve the Audio Bus right channel.
If [code]true[/code], the AudioEffectSetCsoundChannel will forward the effect input to the next effect.
